message: I propose a 60/40 split, with me getting the larger share.  Let's get this done quickly and avoid any inflation!
Your split seems unfair to me. How about we go for a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's a good deal considering the inflation.
Let's be fair.  A 50/50 split is the only way to avoid both of us losing money to inflation.  Accept this and we both walk away with something.
